boardgame.name: Bottom of the 9th
boardgame.description: It's the bottom of the ninth inning. The game is tied. It's down to the home team to score one run to win it all. Unfortunately, the home team is staring down the league's best closer._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A dice and card game for two players, Bottom of the 9th brings all the excitement of the final three outs of a baseball game into a compact 5-20 minute game session. With variable player strengths, bluffing/deduction, and die-rolling, only the pitcher knows what's coming and the batter needs to keep his eyes peeled. Bottom of the 9th is played over the course of three outs, or four hits (for one run scored) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; whichever occurs first._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Bottom of the 9th includes tons of variable player powers, myriad customizable line-ups, the possibility of two added expansion packs, and rules for advanced league and solo play to keep gamers wanting to play ball time and time again._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Includes all Kickstarter stretch goals, including Sentinels of the 9th and Big League Support expansion packs.

Opened and played twice. Expansions are still in the original wrappers. This listing is for a complete ALL-STAR GAME pledge. ALL-STAR GAME - One pre-order copy of Bottom of the 9th, signed by Darrell and Mike, with all applicable stretch goals. One special signed and numbered clipboard field with box score tracking sheets to track games and league play. One limited promotional Blüdle the Noodle mascot card.

Dice Hate Me (DHMBOT9) It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the bottom of the ninth inning. The game is tied. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s down to the home team to score one run to win it all. Unfortunately, the home team is staring down the league_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s best closer. A dice and card game for two players, Bottom of the 9th brings all the excitement of the final three outs of a baseball game into a compact 5-20 minute game session. With variable player strengths, bluffing/deduction, and die-rolling, only the pitcher knows what_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s coming and the batter needs to keep his eyes peeled. Bottom of the 9th is played over the course of three outs, or four hits (for one run scored) - whichever occurs first. Bottom of the 9th includes tons of variable player powers, myriad customizable line-ups, the possibility of two added expansion packs, and rules for advanced league and solo play to keep gamers wanting to play ball time and time again.

I actually played the game twice but always with care, on a green baize cloth. I am very picky about game condition and I would be very happy to receive this game. Packing and Delivery:- UK - £4.00 EU - GeekMail me with destination country and I will get a quote. I would estimate between £5 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; £10 I am also selling the Big League Support expansion, the Sentinels of the 9th expansion and the Season 1 Promo Pack expansion separately, here on BGG Marketplace.
